summary: Filmed during his "Black Album" era, Jay-Z looks back on his career as one of rap music's most successful emcees and entrepreneurs.
cast: Jay-Z|Fonzworth Bentley|Beyoncé|Memphis Bleek|Mary J. Blige|Foxy Brown|Michael Buffer|Sean 'Diddy' Combs|Common|Damon Dash|Missy Elliott|Freeway|Funkmaster Flex|Ghostface Killah|R. Kelly|Mike D|Q-Tip|Questlove|Slick Rick|Rick Rubin|Afeni Shakur|Beanie Sigel|Timbaland|Twista|Usher|Voletta Wallace|Kanye West|Pharrell Williams|Jaguar Wright
director: Directors: Patrick Paulson, Michael John Warren
title: Fade to Black
